description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical – in the case of this experiment session administered with two per test period
test period - each containing two test sessions with the second set of sessions repeated within a 60 day period
total duration the participant spent recovering honey
